title: SPC & Medical Supplies Division at COPE
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The State Pharmaceutical Corporation and the Medical Supplies Division of the Ministry of Health have been summoned before the Committee on Public Enterprises on Tuesday (31) at 10.00 AM.
They have been summoned to inquire into the current performance of the relevant institutions.
Key State Institutions gazetted under President; PM gets Central Bank.
General Shavendra Silva – The new Chief of the Defence Staff.
WEATHER: Wind speeds up to 50 kmph / 100 mm rainfall expected
